48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ali [may Allah be pleased with him] said:“Fatimah went to the Prophet complaining of her hands blistering, so he ordered her to say At-Tasbīḥ, At-Takbīr, and At-Taḥmīd.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّسْبِيحِ وَالتَّكْبِيرِ وَالتَّحْمِيدِ عِنْدَ الْمَنَامِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About: At-Tasbih, At-Takbir, And At-Tahmid When Going To Sleep
